basic_info.description: My name is Adam Mielcarek. I'm working with the newest frameworks like React, Node, and Sass. I am also in the process of learning Firebase and Python. I've recently completed a bootcamp program through University of Denver and acquired my certification in Full-Stack Development and Software Engineering. I am currently developing and working through concepts of new applications to bring people joy and fill their lives with light.

projects.title: README.md Generator
projects.description: I created this application for developers to intuitively generate a stylized, professional looking README depending on their answers to a series of questions in their command line using Node.js

projects.title: Sunshine on My Mind
projects.description: User may input any accpeted City, and State in the search area and then receive current weather readings as well as a 5 day forecast. User may also revisit past searches saved in the console log, displayed in the UI with interactive links.

projects.title: Cheat-Sheet
projects.description: As a small business owner I want to be able to write and save notes so that I can organize my thoughts and keep track of tasks I need to complete.
